1445120.name: Fast Typing Master
1445120.description:
Learn typing with Fast Typing Master and find how fast you can type. The app has a rich set of free typing lessons with options like hard/normal/easy. You can become a typing master with the help of this game. One huge benefit: The more you use our typing game, the faster you will able to type the most frequent words faster, you will be able to type everything else faster as well!

It's not just a "Typing" entertainment game, training can make you more productive at work, make fewer spelling errors, and learn new words.
